  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    A utility for executing Oracle sqlldr from java

    • Constructor Detail

      • SqlldrUtil

        public SqlldrUtil()
        Default constructor

      • SqlldrUtil

        public SqlldrUtil(String loadId,
          String appId,
          String table,
          String[] columns,
          Map<String,String> options,
          String method)
        Loaded constructor, sets all ivars.
        Parameters:
        loadId - a unique id for the load
        appId - the id of the calling or related app
        table - the table in which to load
        columns - the column list
        options - the sqlddr options names and values
        method - the load method. see setMethod(String)
